original: **ZE_FFVII_COSMO_CANYON**
zh_trans: **最终幻想：雪域星空 (宇宙峡谷雪原版)**

original: **Map by Headshooter.SC & HaRyDe**
**WARMUP ROUND**
**NORMAL MODE**
[Cloud] Hmm.. Seems like the engines are broken.. We are stuck in the middle of this desert!
zh_trans: [克劳德] 嗯…… 引擎似乎坏了.. 我们被困在沙漠中央了!

original: [Red-XIII] Do not worry. I know this place.. I was born in here..
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 别担心克劳德，这个地方我很熟悉...我就是在这出生的..

original: [Cloud] Well.. That means.. That we can find some staff to make our ship working again.. Right?
zh_trans: [克劳德] 好吧。就是说，我们可以找到帮手来修复我们的飞船..是吧？

original: [Red-XIII] Of course. But I need to do something first.. I will see you in the Gi Cave.
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 没错。但在此之前，我需要处理一点事，咱在基族洞窟里会面

original: [Red-XIII] There I will give you all the stuff you need.
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 那时候我会给你找到帮手的

original: [Cloud] No problem. I will wait for you in there..
**A player has picked up Damage materia**
zh_trans: **玩家拾起了 破坏魔晶石**

original: **Cover here for 5 seconds before we clear this obstacle**
zh_trans: ** 在障碍清除前掩护此处 5 秒

original: **We are almost at Cosmo Canyon**
**Defend here for 25 seconds until the gates open**
**Gates are open. Welcome to Cosmo Canyon**
**A player has picked up HEAL materia**
zh_trans: **玩家拾起了 治疗魔晶石 **

original: **The barman will open the door in 5 seconds**
zh_trans: **酒吧店主会在 5 秒后给我们开门

original: **Zombies are coming. Defend Cosmo Bar for 25 seconds before we open the back door**
zh_trans: **僵尸袭来! 在后门打开前守住星空酒吧 25 秒**

original: **5 SECONDS LEFT**
**FALL BACK**
**A player has picked up BIO materia**
zh_trans: **玩家拾取了 剧毒魔晶石**

original: **THE EXPLOSIVE WILL BLOW UP THE ROCK IN 25 SECONDS**
**A player has picked up GRAVITY materia**
zh_trans: **玩家拾起了 黑洞魔晶石**

original: **The gates will open in 25 seconds**
**The gates of gi cave will open in 15 seconds**
zh_trans: **基族洞窟的大门 15 秒后开启**

original: **A player has picked up ELECTRO materia**
**Wait until something happens**
**The gi gate will open in 35 seconds**
**GRENADES DO A LOT OF DAMAGE. USE THEM!**
zh_trans: **手雷能造成更多伤害。记得丢雷!**

original: **SOME OF YOUR ITEMS CAN DAMAGE THE BOSS**
**Gi Nattak is using fire**
**Gi Nattak is using wind**
**Gi Nattak is using silence**
**Gi Nattak is spawning minions. Watch out for them**
zh_trans: **基纳塔克 召唤了奴仆。小心他们!**

original: **Gi Nattak is using gravity**
**Gi Nattak is using poison**
**Gi Nattak is using shield**
**GI NATTAK IS USING ULTIMA. KILL HIM FASTER!!**
zh_trans: **基纳塔克 使用了终极! 快杀了他要不然都得死**

original: **ADMIN HAS CHANGED MAP LEVEL VIA ADMIN ROOM**
zh_trans: **管理员在调关房更改了地图关卡**

original: **ADMIN PRESSED KILL ALL BUTTON**
**RAGE MODE**
**Cover here for 10 seconds before we clear this obstacle**
zh_trans: **在障碍清除前掩护此处 10 秒**

original: **A player has picked up WIND materia**
**The rock will explode in 25 seconds**
**The detonator seems to be broken**Go another way**
zh_trans: **雷管看上去坏了**得想个法子**

original: **The airship to Shinra will arrive in 30 seconds**
zh_trans: **前往神罗公司的飞船 30 秒后抵达**

original: [Cloud] Hold on! I will take you on the airship.. And then we will go to Shinra base.
zh_trans: [克劳德] 守住! 我会带你上船的，然后我们一起前往神罗基地

original: [Cloud] Red-XIII will stay here and will help to reestablish the Village.
zh_trans: [克劳德] 赤红十三会留在这里帮助他们重建村子

original: **The airship is right here...**
**A player has picked up EARTH materia**
**A player has picked up FIRE materia**
zh_trans: **玩家拾起了 火焰魔晶石**

original: **Zombie Confuse has been picked up**
**A player has picked up SLEEP materia**
zh_trans: **玩家拾起了 沉寂魔晶石**

original: **Gi Nattak is using Fire Nova!!! Get out of middle**
zh_trans: **基纳塔克 即将释放秒杀技能!!!不想死就远离中间**

original: **Gi Nattak is using aspil**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克 使用了吸血

original: **Gi Nattak has healed 150 hp**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克 恢复了150点血量

original: **Gi Nattack is escaped**
**Now you can get out of Cave of Gi**
zh_trans: **你现在可以离开基族洞穴了**

original: **DOOR OPENS IN 40 SECONDS**
**10 SECONDS LEFT**
**This is your last hold point**
**Get on the rocks and hold 25 seconds**
[Red-XIII] Congrats! You made it.. But seems like Gi Nattak ran away somehow.. We will defeat him next time..
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 恭喜! 你做到了，但是基纳塔克逃走了! 不过我们下次会彻底击败他的!

original: **NORMAL mode was beaten. Unlocking HARD mode **
zh_trans: **普通模式已完成。正在解锁困难模式**

original: **EXTREME MODE**
[Red-XIII] That guy could summon Bahamut.. Where did he take that power?
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 那家伙能召唤巴哈姆特!? 他是怎么得到那种力量的?

original: [Red-XIII] Anyways we need to defeat Gi Nattak for once and for all..
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 算了，不管怎样。我们要彻底击败基纳塔克

original: **CHEST SIDEQUEST STARTED**
**FIND ALL THE GOLDEN CHESTS TO GET A SPECIAL ITEM THAT WILL HELP YOU ON GI NATTAK**
zh_trans: **找到所有的黄金箱子以取得特殊神器，那可以帮助你们击败基纳塔克

original: **A player has picked up ULTIMA materia**
zh_trans: **玩家拾起了 终极魔晶石**

original: **A player has picked up Ice materia**
**HARD MODE**
**Hard mode is beaten. Challenge yourself in EXTREME mode ! **
zh_trans: ** 困难模式已通过，下一关将会是 极限难度！**

original: **...Are you surprised?...**
**...Didn't you expect me?...**
**...Oh okay i'm disappearing...**
**The gates will open in 30 seconds**
[Cloud] Guys be careful! If Genesis is really here then it might be Jenova.. Fighting them both will not be easy..
zh_trans: [克劳德] 兄弟们注意一下。如果杰尼西斯真的在这里，那可能是杰诺瓦..跟他们两个打，那可是一场恶战。

original: [Cloud] Especially if he got Gi Nattak soul.. Hard to imagine how mighty he will become..
zh_trans: [克劳德]特别是如果他得到了基纳塔克的灵魂...无法想象他会强到什么地步...

original: [Cloud] If you succeed with that then we explode the base with Jenova.
zh_trans: [克劳德] 如果你们成功了，就引爆基地与杰诺瓦同归于尽

original: **Wait 5 more seconds**
**Shinra gates will open in 25 seconds**
**The gates will open in 15 seconds**
**The elevator will leave in 15 seconds**
**Genesis is defeated. Get back in the elevator**
zh_trans: **杰尼西斯已被击败。快撤退到电梯**

original: [Cloud] Really do not think that he could lose that easy.. Anyways the base will explode soon.
zh_trans: [克劳德]我不太相信他会那么容易就被击败的...算了，不管怎样，基地快要爆炸了!

original: [Cloud] See you on the top evacuation point.
**The power is lost. Defend until the emergency generators are on**
zh_trans: **电力已被中断。防守至应急发电器启动**

original: **We got the power. The gates will open in 15 seconds**
** Nades do more damage. **
**You have beaten Cosmo Canyon!! Congratulations !! **
zh_trans: **恭喜你们通关最终幻想VII：雪域星空!**

original: [Cloud] Nice job! I hope that we are done with them for once and for all. The next stop is Cosmo Canyon..
zh_trans: [克劳德] 干的不错! 希望下次我们能彻底干掉他们! 下一站是宇宙峡谷...

original: **Jenova is defeated!**
**YOU MUST TO KILL ALL THE ZOMBIES TO WIN**
** EXTREME mode is beaten. Get ready for your last challenge ...**
zh_trans: ** 已通关极限难度。准备好迎接你最后的挑战... **

original: **Ultimate MODE**
**Cover here for 15 seconds before we clear this obstacle**
zh_trans: ** 我们正在清理障碍，掩护 15 秒 **

original: **Zombies are coming. Defend Cosmo Bar for 30 seconds before we open the back door**
zh_trans: ** 僵尸袭来。守住星空酒吧 30 秒。稍后我们会打开后门**

original: **Chest Quest completed!**
**The reward is waiting for you in the gi cave**
**A player has picked up Phoenix Down**
**ZM MODE**
**Map has been beaten. Find a place to defend yourself on and keep the zombies away from it**
zh_trans: ** 地图已通关。找个地方苟到核爆就行**

original: [Red-XIII] Cosmo Canyon is almost back to normal. The observatory still needs to be repaired.
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 宇宙峡谷恢复了平静，不过天文台还需要修理

original: [Cloud] These guys could defeat Genesis and Jenova. I think that is one problem solved for us.
zh_trans: [克劳德] 他们击败了杰尼西斯和杰诺瓦。给我们帮了大忙了

original: [Red-XIII] I cannot find enough words to thank them for all... they did a really good job.
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 我无法用言语表达我的感激...他们真的很棒!

original: [Red-XIII] I guess we can rest for a bit here and keep going then.. What do you think?
zh_trans: [赤红十三] 我想我们可以在这里休整一会... 你们觉得呢？

original: [Cloud] Sounds good.. we need to keep moving. We still have to stop Sephiroth.. So we still have a lot to do.
zh_trans: [克劳德] 我没意见... 不过我们需要继续前进。我们必须阻止萨菲罗斯，还有很多事情要做呢

original: [Cloud] So lets start from the Temple of the Ancients..
zh_trans: [克劳德] 所以让我们向幻妖之森出发吧

original: **2 MINUTES LEFT!**
**Zombie cactus has been picked up**
**1 MINUTES LEFT!**
**30 SECONDS LEFT!**
**15 SECONDS LEFT!**
**Teleporting humans to the Observatory**
**Defend here for 15 seconds before the platform leaves**
**The platform is leaving**
**WINNERS GONNA CHANGE NEXT STAGE**
**THE WINNERS HAD SELECTED THE MODE**
